explanation: [0-0] A blonde girl wearing a colorful top and plaid skirt is taking photos of a black-haired girl opposite her. The black-haired girl is wearing a plaid top and a black skirt. There is a blue locker on the left. There is a beige door in the upper right corner.

[0-8] The blonde girl looks for different angles to photograph the black-haired girl. Then the camera zooms in. The black-haired girl is expressionless with her arms crossed, rolling her eyes. The scene changes to the blonde girl making various expressions, smiling, and changing the shooting angle. The camera zooms in and the scene changes to the blonde girl proudly showing the photos she took to the black-haired girl.
